tasks.description: Added insider, sentiment, holders commands to yf CLI. Free tier = US only.

tasks.title: Eloise Lavvo calendar events
tasks.description: 58 all-day events for Midi weeks (minus holidays) in AutoCalendar

tasks.title: Full Disk Access for OpenClaw
tasks.description: Granted FDA to /usr/local/bin/openclaw — no more permission popups

tasks.title: Move age secret key to password manager
tasks.description: Secret key is in ~/citadel-backups/key.txt (plaintext). Move to 1Password/Bitwarden, then delete key.txt. Public key is baked into backup script — leave that.

tasks.title: Google Chat: download SA JSON key
tasks.description: GCP → Service Accounts → New JSON key → save as ~/.openclaw/googlechat-sa.json. Then ping Anna to finish config.

tasks.title: Install Claude Code
tasks.description: Terminal: sudo npm install -g @anthropic-ai/claude-code

tasks.title: gog auth for banna@bottenanna.no
tasks.description:
Terminal: gog auth add banna@bottenanna.no --services gmail,calendar,drive,contacts,docs,sheets
Åpner browser for OAuth-samtykke. Ping Anna etterpå.

tasks.title: Rotate Anthropic API key
tasks.description: Key exposed in session context. Generate new at console.anthropic.com, then tell Anna to update config.

tasks.title: Enable 2FA on Telegram (Knut + Melissa)
tasks.description: Settings → Privacy & Security → Two-Step Verification. Biggest single risk — Telegram account compromise = full Anna access.

tasks.title: Report OpenClaw config.get redaction bug
tasks.description: config.get redacts keys in raw but leaks them in resolved/config sections. File GitHub issue at github.com/openclaw/openclaw.

tasks.title: Morning prefetch watchdog
tasks.description: Build watchdog that checks briefing-data.txt freshness + script exit status after cron, alerts via Telegram if stale or failed.

tasks.title: Daily memory digest automation
tasks.description: Finish memory-digest pipeline (stream-safe parser + fallback) and schedule nightly cron to write digests + lessons.

tasks.title: Cron log consolidation
tasks.description: Centralize cron stdout/stderr into logs/ with timestamps + add quick viewer in mission control dashboard.

tasks.title: Disposable sandbox workspace
tasks.description: Set up isolated workspace for risky experiments (gitignored dir + helper script to rsync artifacts back).

tasks.title: State snapshot file
tasks.description: Implement state.json capturing last commands/results/next steps for quick context after compaction.

tasks.title: Cron watchdog
tasks.description: Monitor cron run history for consecutive failures, alert/auto-tune jobs when thresholds hit.

tasks.title: Sandbox auto-runner
tasks.description: Helper command to spin disposable worktree, run coding agent, and sync artifacts back.

tasks.title: State+heartbeat Mission Control widget
tasks.description: Expose last state snapshot + heartbeat summaries on dashboard for quick recovery.

tasks.title: Fix cron timeout epidemic
tasks.description: Add Ollama warmup cron, run failing scripts manually to isolate bottlenecks, split heavy jobs (Infra Sync etc.) and tune timeoutSeconds

tasks.title: Fix model-not-allowed cron errors
tasks.description: Update cron jobs referencing anthropic/claude-sonnet-4-20250514 to allowed models (qwen3-fast or gpt-5.1-codex)
